page.title: 04A DAY IN SCHOOL
page.content: On Mondays Mrs.Peters comes in and does needlework with us. Mrs. Triggs and Mrs. Howard help with cooking. On a Tuesday we have the computer and my favourite game is Mr. Silly's Hat Game. We have singing practice too. The reading book I am on is called ONCE LONG AGO, and the SMP card I am on is Card 31. We write book reviews.At the moment my topic is Experiments.{Karen Stephens}Aged 7. ...................................... On a Thursday at Half past nine I go to violins and we come back at about a quarter to ten. After lunch it is PE and if it is nice we go out and play rounders. If it is not a nice day we get the apparatus out and use that. At the end of a Thursday we have a game like SIMON SAYS or Mr.Fowle reads us a story. {Christine Pullen} Aged 7 years
